Construction Activity Description, Test Type and Acceptance Criteria - Cables must meet AS/NZS 3000 & AS/NZS5000 requirements.
○ Minimum Street Lighting supply cable size shall be 1C 10mm² neutral screen cable.
Standard, Drawing or Specification Reference - 3235599-SP03-BE-1000: Note 5,7
Construction Activity Description, Test Type and Acceptance Criteria - Luminaires as per IFC approved drawings and specifications.
○ All Luminaires shall be tilted at an angle of 0 Degrees to Horizontal unless stated otherwise.
○ Each Luminar shall be provided with a 7 - PIN NEMA Socket and a LPC (Light Point Controller) to provide on-off light switching.

Construction Activity Description, Test Type and Acceptance Criteria - Contractor to provide new Dali Control system in controls section of board, Dali to be controlled by Rotary Dimmer for commissioning and adjustment purposes
Construction Activity Description, Test Type and Acceptance Criteria - Surveyor to Setout light pole locations as per the model.
○ Where pole is within 2m of the dripline of the trees, assess whether the tree requires trimming to minimise shadowing, and notify the Engineer for further action if required.
○ If the final pole location exceeds the permitted tolerance further lighting design may be required.
